verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: Oh boy] : [ARGM-LOC: In a sweeping interview on Fox News Wednesday night] , [ARG0: former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani] [V: said] [ARG1: President Donald Trump had repaid his lawyer Michael Cohen for a $ 130,000 payment to adult film star Stormy Daniels prior to the 2016] ...

Oh boy : In a sweeping interview on Fox News Wednesday night , former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani said President Donald Trump [V: had] repaid his lawyer Michael Cohen for a $ 130,000 payment to adult film star Stormy Daniels prior to the 2016 ...
